statements: UPDATE biometric_data SET fingerprint='fingerprint123' WHERE id=1
UPDATE user_info SET age=30 WHERE name='John'
UPDATE biometric_data SET timestamp='2022-01-01 00:00:00' WHERE id=2
UPDATE biometric_data SET fingerprint_data = ? WHERE id = ?
UPDATE user_data SET age = ? WHERE user_id = ?
UPDATE device_data SET device_name = ? WHERE device_id = ?
UPDATE UserBiometrics SET fingerprint = 'new_fingerprint_data' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE HeartRateData SET rate = 80 WHERE user_id = 1
UPDATE BloodPressureData SET systolic_pressure = 120, diastolic_pressure = 80 WHERE user_id = 1
UPDATE users SET age = 30 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE fingerprints SET timestamp = NOW() WHERE fingerprint_id = 1;
UPDATE heart_rate SET heart_rate = 80 WHERE user_id = 1;
